title: Index of Factory Employment- Wearing Apparel for United States
notes:
Source: 1919-1922: Furnished Direct By Frb, Division Of Research And Statistics; 1923-1924: Federal Reserve Bulletin October 1938, Pp 858-860; 1935-July 1939: Frb, Revised Indexes Of Factory Employment Oct.1939, Pp 8. Federal Reserve Monthly

This NBER data series m08081 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 8 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter08.html.
